item.description:
Dear Members,

 It seems that the meetup.com site has been accidentally putting up information that I didn't write, so I want to tell everyone that our next meet is THIS coming Sunday, March 13th at 1-4pm.

If there are enough people that want to come to another meet soon, I will have one on March 20th as well.  Please let me know which one(s) you are attending! Of course, everyone is invited to attend both, if there is room.  I may have two meets per month in the future, especially in the bad weather months.

Admission is $5 per household, NOT $20!!!!  I cannot seem to get this off the site and replace it with $5!!!!

Please bring a food or beverage to share.

See you there!

Small dog best,

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEET, March 13th, Sunday, Holliston Meadows,$5
